title: Welcome aboard!
message: Welcome to the community! We're excited to have you here. You now have access to a platform that connects alumni and current students. Make sure to explore all the opportunities that lie ahead! üéâ

title: First post created!
message: You've successfully created your first post in the community! Keep sharing your ideas and engaging with others to grow your presence and network. üöÄ

title: New Partnership Opportunity
message: A new partnership opportunity has just been announced. This could be the perfect chance to collaborate and expand your professional network! Don't miss out. ü§ù

title: New Message from Taiwo
message: You have a new message from Taiwo! Check your inbox to see what they have to say. This could be the start of a great conversation. üì¨

title: Alumni Event Invitation
message: We are pleased to invite you to the upcoming alumni event. This is your chance to reconnect, network, and share experiences with others who walked the same path as you. üéì

title: Someone liked your post!
message: Great news! Your recent post has been liked by another member. Keep the momentum going and engage even more with the community. üëç

title: New Connection!
message: You have a new connection request! Building a strong network is key to success, and this is a great step forward. Reach out and start a conversation. ü§ù

title: Join our growing network!
message: We've noticed your profile matches many of our top contributors. Join our exclusive network to connect with industry professionals and start collaborating on exciting projects.

title: Profile completion reminder
message: Your profile is almost complete! Ensure that you fill in all the necessary information to increase your visibility and improve your chances of networking with like-minded individuals.

title: You've been invited to join a group!
message: A group that aligns with your interests has invited you to join. This is a great way to connect with individuals who share your passion. Don't hesitate, join the conversation!

title: New Project Collaboration Request
message: Someone has reached out to you to collaborate on an exciting project! This is your opportunity to work with other professionals and showcase your skills on a new stage.

title: You've reached a new milestone!
message: Congratulations! You've just hit an important milestone within the community. Your active participation and contributions are making an impact. Keep up the great work!

title: Community Survey Available
message: We'd love to hear from you! A new survey is available for members to provide feedback on their experience. Your insights help us improve and grow.

title: Job Opportunity Recommendation
message: A job opportunity that matches your profile has been recommended to you. Explore the details and see if this could be the next big step in your career.

title: New Message Request
message: You have a new message request! Someone is trying to reach out to you. Review their profile and decide if you'd like to connect further.

title: Your Profile Has Been Viewed
message: Someone has recently viewed your profile. Now's a great time to ensure everything is up-to-date and make a strong first impression on potential connections or opportunities.

title: Friend Recommendation
message: We've found someone you might know based on mutual connections. Reach out and see how you can strengthen your network!

title: You've received a new testimonial!
message: A fellow member has left a testimonial on your profile! This is a great way to build credibility and showcase your strengths to the community.
